last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 310
last_episode_to_air.overview: TJ sends a boozed-up and confrontational hockey player to the penalty box, a man caught going up a down escalator gives officers a piece of his mind, and cops stop a drunk and shirtless man from harassing a smut peddler.

name: Vegas Strip
overview: Vegas Strip is an American documentary television series that shows the two of Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department's units: the Homeland Security Saturation Team and the Convention Center Area Command as they patrol the Las Vegas Strip. Officers encounter disorderly conduct, drugs, and solicitation among other unique situations. The show is produced by Morgan Langley, co-creator of the popular show COPS. It premiered on July 17, 2011 on the cable network truTV.

episodes.name: Episode 100
episodes.overview: When an apparently tanked tourist makes off with a pirate's sword, Sergeant Tom Jenkins (TJ) and the team take him down... the hard way. Plus, a couple of happy hookers get cited for trespassing by their arch nemesis, and things get personal when a suspect takes a knife to TJ's tires.

episodes.name: Episode 101
episodes.overview: TJ and Co. intervene when a scuffle between two roommates breaks out on the Boulevard, a Vegas virgin gets bagged for allegedly buying drugs, only to find out later the goods were fake, and a suspicious character weaves a web of lies to keep cops from discovering his true identity.

episodes.name: Episode 102
episodes.overview: It's stun gun time on the Strip when a vandal tries to outrun the law, a homeless man wagers his freedom by getting lippy with the cops, and TJ brings down the hammer when a group of apparently drunk and cranky Canadians refuse to obey his orders.

episodes.name: Episode 103
episodes.overview: A working girl tries to flirt her way out of a trip to the Sin City jail, strip-goers point the finger at a young woman who allegedly assaulted her boyfriend in public, and officers respond to a strange call involving a man who claims to be pregnant with a dinosaur egg.

episodes.name: Episode 104
episodes.overview: Vegas cops are on the case when an ex-con raises hell at a local convenience store, TJ slaps the cuffs on a tourist who thought it was cute to slap a police horse on the butt, and officers chase down a drunk who's been allegedly terrorizing street performers on the Strip.

episodes.name: Episode 105
episodes.overview: It's liar, liar, pants on fire when Las Vegas Metro discovers what appear to be drugs in a suspect's pocket, Officer Calvin "Green Eyes" Wandick busts an out-of-town hooker who's down on her luck, and TJ gets tough when a couple of punks knock over an elderly woman on the Strip.

episodes.name: Episode 106
episodes.overview: Cops stop a group of housewives for causing a scene smack dab in the middle of Las Vegas Boulevard. Plus, a man, allegedly high on drugs, leads police on a chase through a casino parking lot, and "Green Eyes" busts a working girl who can't seem to get her story straight.

episodes.name: Vegas Strip Episode 107
episodes.overview: Officers embark on a Strip search for a suspect whom they think's been picking fights with local homeless men, the hunt for an armed and dangerous perp leads police to an unlikely suspect, and a cyclist with an attitude earns himself a ticket to the County Jail.

episodes.name: Episode 108
episodes.overview: A young man on a Four-Loco-induced crime spree gets bagged for breaking into a local motel, TJ busts a biker for flashing his breasts for a buck, and Officer Wandick plays marriage ref when he encount

episodes.name: Episode 201
episodes.overview: A tourist convinced he's still in Texas gets collared for carrying a compound bow on the Strip, a little person with a big buzz makes a play for one of the female officers, and a drunken, gun-toting tourist gets gang-tackled by Vegas finest.

episodes.name: Vegas Strip Episode 202
episodes.overview: A tourist joyride comes to an abrupt halt when TJ spots a beer bottle hanging from the passenger-side door, a drunk and belligerent foreigner gets caught with his pants down, and a tourist under the l

episodes.name: Episode 203
episodes.overview: A tourist joyride comes to an abrupt halt when TJ spots a beer bottle hanging from the passenger-side door, a drunk and belligerent foreigner gets caught with his pants down, and a tourist under the l

episodes.name: Episode 205
episodes.overview: Sergeant Tom Jenkins goes hands-on when a tourist lets it all hang out on the Strip, UFC fighter-turned-Vegas cop, Officer Josh Haynes, teaches a couple of soused-up servicemen a lesson, and a flamboy

episodes.name: Episode 206
episodes.overview: TJ encounters the ghost of Michael Jackson on the Strip, a couple of locals turn the fountain at Caesar's Palace into their own personal swim-up bar, and tourist learns the hard way that heavy drinkin

A drunken high-roller gets a little too close for comfort with Vegas' finest, a couple of working girls give cops the lowdown on the local exchange rate, and a heartbroken young man gets busted for getting touch-feely on the Strip.

episodes.name: Episode 301
episodes.overview: T.J. busts an underage gambler with the worst fake ID ever!? Then, he's forced to play marriage counselor when a jilted husband can't contain his emotions on the Strip. And later, officers respond when a group of wet 'n wild UCLA co-eds goes for a swim in the Bellagio fountain.

episodes.name: Episode 302
episodes.overview: T.J. and his partner encounter a drunk tourist trapped in a time warp. Then, officers lecture two women who thought it was legal to flash their breasts for concert tickets. And later, Officer Wandick pulls over a reckless driver with a unique sweating problem.

episodes.name: Episode 303
episodes.overview: Two working girls get busted - and they have to decide which one of them will head to the clink. Then, a bride-to-be gets caught flashing her breasts on the Strip. And later, a scared bootlegger leads cops on a footchase, wetting his pants in the process.

episodes.name: Episode 305
episodes.overview: TJ offers up relationship advice to a lovesick man; Officer Wandick tries to talk a would-be John out of being "tricked"; and a belligerent tourist gets physical with the cops.

episodes.name: Episode 306
episodes.overview: A melee breaks out on the Strip, Officer Wandick busts a streetwalker with a 98-year-old sugar daddy, and a drunken Usher impersonator tries to dance his way out of an arrest.

episodes.name: Episode 307
episodes.overview: Scantily-clad showgirls engage in a turf war, an Australian tourist gets busted grabbing bikini bottoms, and officers teach an irate cab driver a lesson in anger management.

episodes.name: Episode 308
episodes.overview: Officers bust a dope-dealing diva with no shortage of bizarre excuses; a couple of "working girls" have a candid conversation with cops about their pimp, and a group of Irish tourists pay the price for jumping into the volcano at the Mirage.

episodes.name: Episode 309
episodes.overview: A handcuffed partier tries his best to woo his captor, a go-go dancer puts up the stop sign, and a tripped-out tourist causes trouble.?
